title: Ticket question before preseason drops
body: I was just wondering how long it takes for a ticket to get looked at especially with the preseason update about to drop?

replies.body: Yeah it just sucks that it reset my back to level 1 honor

Well its entirely my fault and I own up to it but I recently had a bad game, and I'm sure I posted this in the wrong board, anyway I recieved a 10 game chat restriction off of 1 game because I was going Rengar jungle and had a Sivir support take smite and steal my red at 1:40 and basically it took away my honor level 5 and all my end of season rewards literally hours before preseason haha all because of one bad game and a trolling sivir. So I'm pretty much SOL on it. But I don't understand how 1 game will get you a chat restriction, I will admit I did flame and I admit to it I was an A-Hole but still.

If all you have is a 10 game chat restriction, then play out those games without being toxic before the season ends and you'll still get your rewards. You're only disqualified for having a chat restriction if it's still there when the season officially ends.

What's up fam? Might be able to help here. 

Also, If we see you submitted the ticket soon enough we should be able to help in the ticket still as well.

Typically NA has a response time of about 12 hours, but with Preseason dropping and the Ranked Season ending that average time will proooobably jump up a little. Please be patient while chaos ensues xD
